title: How to Get the Frostspark Boots in Terraria

steps.headline: Get the Rocket Boots.
steps.description: To get these, you first must smash a Shadow Orb (if you have a Corruption world) or Crimson Heart (if you have a Crimson world). Use enough life crystals to get 200 Health.

steps.headline: Wait for the Goblin Army event.
steps.description:
Each day after the aforementioned step, the Goblin Army has a small chance of occurring. The event isn't very hard to beat, but do this before it happens: 
When the Goblin Army attacks, lead them away from your house and NPCs. Although they aren't as dangerous as other armies, such as Lunar, Pumpkin Moon, or Pirate Armies, they still can spawn in your house, destroying things and killing NPCs. Prepare potions and weapons. As most Goblins in the Goblin Army use swords and other melee weapons, use ranged weapons to combat them. E.g., bows, guns, blowguns, etc.

steps.headline: Beat the event.
steps.description: This is the obvious bit because you won't progress to get frostspark boots without them.

steps.headline: After you beat the Goblin Army, go underground.
steps.description: Look for a bound goblin. Right clicking on him will free him, giving you the Goblin Tinkerer NPC. From him, you can buy both the Rocket Boots for 5 gold and the Tinkerer's Workshop for 10 gold.

steps.headline: Place the Tinkerer's Workshop anywhere in your home.
Find several Underground Cabins.
steps.description: Underground Cabins are mini-uninhabited homes found in different underground biomes. In the standard Underground Biome, you can find the Hermes Boots. In an Underground Tundra or Snow Biome, you can find the Flurry Boots.

steps.headline: If you don't find either of these, you can fish up Wooden or Iron Crates with a chance of finding a pair of Sailfish Boots.
steps.description: Any of these can be used in the recipe.

steps.headline: Once you find one of those, go to your Tinkerer's Workshop and combine your Rocket Boots with the one you found.
steps.description: Make sure the Rocket Boots and the set you found aren't equipped as accessories.

steps.headline: Now you have the Spectre Boots.
steps.description: You can either equip them or store them until they're next needed.

steps.headline: Find The Aglet and the Anklet of the Wind.
steps.description: The Aglet can be found easily by exploring Forest Chests on the Surface. If you can't find one, you have a chance of getting it from a wooden crate while fishing. The Anklet, however, requires more exploration. You can find one in the Underground Jungle Biome, inside of a Jungle Shrine or in a Jungle Crate (fished up only in a Surface Jungle Biome).

steps.headline: Combine the Spectre Boots, Aglet, and Anklet of the Wind at the Tinkerer's Workshop to get the Lightning Boots.
Find the Ice Skates.
steps.description: They can be found randomly in the Underground Tundra or Snow Biome. Look in every Ice Chest you can find, as they contain the boots.

steps.headline: Combine the Lightning Boots with the Ice Skates to get the Frostspark Boots.
steps.description: Congrats, you have one of the best mobility gear out there!

text:
Rocket Boots and Tinkerer's Workshop Get the Rocket Boots. To get these, you first must smash a Shadow Orb (if you have a Corruption world) or Crimson Heart (if you have a Crimson world). Use enough life crystals to get 200 Health. Wait for the Goblin Army event. Each day after the aforementioned step, the Goblin Army has a small chance of occurring. The event isn't very hard to beat, but do this before it happens: 
When the Goblin Army attacks, lead them away from your house and NPCs. Although they aren't as dangerous as other armies, such as Lunar, Pumpkin Moon, or Pirate Armies, they still can spawn in your house, destroying things and killing NPCs. Prepare potions and weapons. As most Goblins in the Goblin Army use swords and other melee weapons, use ranged weapons to combat them. E.g., bows, guns, blowguns, etc. Beat the event. This is the obvious bit because you won't progress to get frostspark boots without them. After you beat the Goblin Army, go underground. Look for a bound goblin. Right clicking on him will free him, giving you the Goblin Tinkerer NPC. From him, you can buy both the Rocket Boots for 5 gold and the Tinkerer's Workshop for 10 gold. Place the Tinkerer's Workshop anywhere in your home.  Spectre Boots Find several Underground Cabins. Underground Cabins are mini-uninhabited homes found in different underground biomes. In the standard Underground Biome, you can find the Hermes Boots. In an Underground Tundra or Snow Biome, you can find the Flurry Boots. If you don't find either of these, you can fish up Wooden or Iron Crates with a chance of finding a pair of Sailfish Boots. Any of these can be used in the recipe. Once you find one of those, go to your Tinkerer's Workshop and combine your Rocket Boots with the one you found. Make sure the Rocket Boots and the set you found aren't equipped as accessories. Now you have the Spectre Boots. You can either equip them or store them until they're next needed. Lightning Boots Find The Aglet and the Anklet of the Wind. The Aglet can be found easily by exploring Forest Chests on the Surface. If you can't find one, you have a chance of getting it from a wooden crate while fishing. The Anklet, however, requires more exploration. You can find one in the Underground Jungle Biome, inside of a Jungle Shrine or in a Jungle Crate (fished up only in a Surface Jungle Biome). Combine the Spectre Boots, Aglet, and Anklet of the Wind at the Tinkerer's Workshop to get the Lightning Boots.  Frostspark Boots Find the Ice Skates. They can be found randomly in the Underground Tundra or Snow Biome. Look in every Ice Chest you can find, as they contain the boots. Combine the Lightning Boots with the Ice Skates to get the Frostspark Boots. Congrats, you have one of the best mobility gear out there!
